title: Can I know how many hours I have put into this game?
body: I'm so interested in finding out if I have done a 1000 hours.

replies.body:
that site is false it only shows how many hours you have played in the new client not the old client.
so its a false answer since iv played since the end of season 2 all through to now. and its says iv only done 104 hours when iv won well over a thousand games and every game can roughly go to 30 minute if estimated. so that well over a 104 hours. PLus im sure im starting to come near the 3 thousand game mark is well. so no this site does not give you a good answer.
just saw it only shows ranked hours so 104 hours iv done in ranked it doesnt show your normal games

> Popular website https://wol.gg/stats/na/donaldjtahm/  does it for you. It probably just reads api of how many games you played and averages it. It should be pretty accurate.

Holyyyyy, I have spent 2.4k hours!

You can check out a lot of stats about your account on our handy [**privacy website**](http://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/). You can see some of your stats like how many ARAM games you've played or how many champions you've killed on Summoner's Rift. 

I don't believe one of the stats we track is time spent in game, but you can get a nice estimation by assuming each Summoner's Rift match takes an average of 30 minutes. Multiply that by the number of games you've played and you'll have a good estimate!
